channel.title: 08 on 英语学习笔记
channel.description: Recent content in 08 on 英语学习笔记

item.description: 2023-08-16 # 40 个英语作文万能句子 # With the development of science and technology, there are more and more people believe that… 随着科技的发展，越来越多的人认为… 例句：With the development of science and technology, there are more and more people believe that e-books will replace traditional books. 随着科技的发展，越来越多的人认为电子书会取代传统书籍。 Internet has been playing an increasingly important role in our daily life. It has brought a lot of benefits but has created some serious problems as well. For example,… 互联网已在我们的生活中扮演着越来越重要的角色。它给我们带来了许多好处，但也产生了一些严重的问题。比如，……
